original_title: Thumbs Up for Mother Universe: The Lonnie Holley Story
overview: Filmed over 20 years, "Thumbs Up for Mother Universe!" tells Lonnie Holley's story, revealing how one man's instinct to create has enabled him to succeed against all oddsâ€”a journey from garbage dumps and prison camps, to festival stages and The Met.
title: Thumbs Up for Mother Universe: The Lonnie Holley Story
